name: Vegematch
description:
VEGEMATCH is an  endless match-3 game, where you race against an ever-increasing timer in order to reach incredible scores! It has a roster of 5 unique characters along side 6 different background themes so you can customize the experience as you please!

====  FEATURES OF THE GAME ====

- 5 unique characters, each with their own passives and actives 

- 6 background skins, ranging from simple forests to a cozy snowy chimneys! 

- 6 sets of pieces, that come with themes matching their background counterparts!

- A screen that you can show to your friends to boast about your amazing stats!

==== ABOUT THE PROJECT ====

This is a passion project made for my mom, since she enjoys these types of games the most! My name's Alex, and if you like what I've made here, you can check out my other stuff on my Twitter!

https://twitter.com/NeaguAlex13
